metadata.title: CVE-2019-14441 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in Libav 12.3. An access violationallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash),as demonstrated by avconv. This is related to ff_mpa_synth_filter_float inavcodec/mpegaudiodsp_template.c. NOTE: This may be a duplicate ofCVE-2018-19129.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
